title: [EUW] [Master+]Team with Gaming House LF Top/Mid/Jung
body:
The requirements will be: Minimum elo in soloQ Master, excellent knowledge of English, Competitive experience, availability 4 hours a day exept Saturdays and holidays. Our team believes in their players and their potential, for this he decided to invest heavily in the project, he can guarantee:
- Salary 1OO/moth
- Bootcamp in our Gaming House as much as we can
- Specialized technical staff (Team Manager, Head Coach, Coaches, Analysts and Mental Coach)
- paid travels and costs of providing (ex: Bootcamp, LAN ecc... )
- if our players needs hardware we will provide it Anyone who comply the requirements and wants to participate in the selections must complete the document below. Entries will be available from 12/09 to 08/10, but tryouts will be announced later.
or contact me on lol client "Calynwar"
